borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: The roof of the development hereby permitted shall not be used as a roof terrace.&nbsp;

The outbuilding hereby approved shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwellinghouse as such. It shall not be used for purposes conflicting with the use of the property as a single dwellinghouse, and in particular it shall not be used as a separate unit of accommodation.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.

The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

Site Location Plan - 09/12/2022

Pre-Existing and Existing Block Plans - 01607 - 02/12/2022

Existing Plans (Rear Canopy) - 01604 - 08/12/2022

Existing Elevations (Rear Canopy) - 01605 - 08/12/2022

Proposed Plans and Elevations (Outbuilding) - 01606 Revision 1 - 08/12/2022, revised 26/01/2023

No other drawings or documents apply.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Retrospective application for the construction of a rear canopy extension and outbuilding and the proposed reduction of the chimney stack on the outbuilding
